description:
Everyday. All day. The lightweight prAna Crew T-Shirt for men is simply the best everyday style around. Seriously, you might want to pick up more than one of these soft and sustainable staples, because they're built to stay comfortable and classic every day of the week.

Part of our bestselling prAna Basics collection, this versatile style is Fair Trade Certified™, meaning the breathably soft organic cotton and the facility it was made in are approved by Fair Trade USA. Talk about a style that truly feels good.
name: Prana prAna Crew T-Shirt - Mens
